articles.title: Scores missing and two dead as burst glacier triggers flash floods in India
articles.description: Around 157 people are missing and at least two confirmed dead after a glacier burst, triggering flash floods in India's northern Uttarakhand state on Sunday.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: The Covid-19 news is bad, but there's room for optimism
articles.description: Poll of the week: A new Axios/Ipsos poll finds that 63% of adults say they have had or are likely to get the Covid-19 vaccine as soon as it's made available to them. That's the highest ever recorded by Ipsos.

articles.title: After a decade in a shelter, a rescue dog named Wiggles finally has a home
articles.description: Wiggles, a rescue dog, had food, a backyard and plenty of laps to sit on. But for 11 years, she was missing one thing -- a family. That changed this week when Wiggles, a 14-year-old pit bull mix, was finally adopted after a decade at an Illinois shelter.
